| source random records = 10
| metadata 
	name="TEST_QUERY"
	firstname = "Hana"
	value = 42
| record
	[NAME, VALUE]
	[meta(firstname), meta(value)]
	["Rakesh", 88]

| filter NAME == "Hana"
; 

| mimic name="TEST_QUERY" remove=["source"]
# check remove first command in query, first and only record will be:
# NAME 	VALUE
# Hana	42
